entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow mixed with rain beginning near noon. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 17 February 2023
